channel.title: Posts on My Simple Dev Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My Simple Dev Blog

item.title: Building GitHub Page Blog
item.description: Install hugo (mac) Brew install hugo Create two repositories on GitHub and Make them public sjiang20.github.io (going to be used as URL) Blog Clone Blog repositories to local Inside of Blog, create,RUN hugo new site dev-tips Inside of dev-tips, go directly to themes Choose one of the favorite Themes from HUGO official website git clone the Themes from HUGO official website to themes Open up config.
